channel.title: Child pays for parent (CPFP) on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Mempool Ancestors and Descendants
item.description: John and Gloria continue their discussion of Bitcoin’s mempool by explaining parent, child, ancestor and descendant transactions.

item.title: Chaincode Decoded: Mempool
item.description: The Chaincode Decoded segment returns and we jump into the deep end of the mempool.
